Package ninja.jira.skeletonkey.app.controller

Class ForeignTransactionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.jira.skeletonkey.app.controller.ForeignTransactionController
  • @CrossOrigin
@Controller
@RequestMapping(path="/api/transaction/foreign")
public class ForeignTransactionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller for class ForeignTransaction. This class is an extension of class Transaction. Uses GET methods when retrieving data from db Uses POST methods otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • addNewForeignTransaction

        @PostMapping(path="/add")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNewForeignTransaction​(@RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String fromAccount,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String toAccount,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.Double amount,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String description,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String currencyCode,
                                                                           java.lang.String date)
        This method adds a foreign transaction to the db
        Parameters:
        fromAccount - account funds is being transferred from
        toAccount - account funds is being transferred to
        amount - amount of funds to be transferred
        description - details for future reference
        currencyCode - identifies the currency to be used, determines the conversion rate used in foreignCurrency table
        Returns:
        new foreign transaction object if successful, error message otherwise

      • getExchangeRate

        @RequestMapping(path="/list")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getExchangeRate()
        This method gets back a list of all available currency and to transact in
        Returns:
        foreign currency list in json
